title: provideState
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/store

provideStatelink

Provides additional slices of state in the Store. These providers cannot be used at the component level.

provideState(featureNameOrSlice: string | FeatureSlice<any, any>, reducers?: ActionReducerMap<any, any> | ActionReducer<any, any> | InjectionToken<ActionReducerMap<any, any>> | InjectionToken<ActionReducer<any, any>>, config: StoreConfig<any, any> | InjectionToken<StoreConfig<any, any>> = {}): EnvironmentProviders

Parameters

featureNameOrSlice string | FeatureSlice<any, any>
reducers ActionReducerMap<any, any> | ActionReducer<any, any> | InjectionToken<ActionReducerMap<any, any>> | InjectionToken<ActionReducer<any, any>>

Optional. Default is undefined.
config StoreConfig<any, any> | InjectionToken<StoreConfig<any, any>>

Optional. Default is {}.

Returns

EnvironmentProviders

featureName string

Usage noteslink

Providing Store Featureslink

const booksRoutes: Route[] = [ { path: '', providers: [provideState('books', booksReducer)], children: [ { path: '', component: BookListComponent }, { path: ':id', component: BookDetailsComponent }, ], }, ];
